abstract: Nicolás Hernán Gonzalo Otamendi (born 12 February 1988) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays for Clube Atlético Mineiro on loan from Valencia CF in Spain, as a central defender.In his professional career he played mainly for Vélez Sársfield and Porto, winning eight major titles with the second including three national championships and the 2011 Europa League.An Argentine international since 2009, Otamendi represented the country at the 2010 World Cup.
